item.title: How to play tech outside of the megacaps, and an industrial stock that will get a boost from Fed rate cuts
item.description: Frank Holland breaks down what traders are watching ahead of the new session.

item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Netflix, American Eagle, Broadcom & more
item.description: Here are the biggest calls on Wall Street on Monday.

item.title: Investment bank Lazard to get a boost from improving dealmaking outlook, KBW says
item.description: The firm upgraded Lazard stock to an outperform rating from market perform.

item.title: Bank of America downgrades American Eagle, says Sydney Sweeney boost to be spoiled by tariff costs
item.description: Bank of America believes that shares of American Eagle could fall an additional 22% from here.

item.title: Nvidia gets a price target increase from Stifel ahead of earnings this week
item.description: The firm maintained its overweight rating on the stock, while raising its price target.
